work.name: West Virginia University, Morgantown, WV, USA
work.summary: Conducting cutting-edge research and developing state-of-the-art deep learning models for medical image/video data analysis, specializing in multi-label classification of ChexNet X-ray images. Exploring the latest advancements in ChatGPT, Generative AI, and LLMs while contributing to increased research productivity.

work.name: C-JeS Gulliver Studio, Seoul, South Korea
work.summary: Achieved 20% higher realism in digital-human characters by applying advanced deep learning techniques for Metaverse applications. Reduced production time by 30% through innovative 2D to 3D conversion methods. Authored two research papers, elevating the studio's reputation in digital-human technology.

work.name: DeltaX.ai, Seoul, South Korea
work.summary: Developed deep learning techniques for human activity recognition, with a focus on violence detection in videos and images. Collaborated on the Self-Driving Data Contest 2021 and identified growth opportunities in emerging markets.

work.name: Sungkyunkwan University, Seoul, South Korea
work.summary: Pioneered thumbnail-based video analysis for streaming platforms, achieving a 3.57% boost in computational efficiency. Developed disclosure documents for intellectual property protection and authored research manuscripts, raising the lab's academic profile.

work.name: Gachon University, Seongnam, South Korea
work.summary: Participated in developing AI-based healthcare solutions for seniors and collaborated on multiview video surveillance summarization algorithms.
